steps.name: Open Special Flavors category page
Open page with path: produkt-kategory/oezel-tatlar
Wait for element to be visible: //nav[@class='woocommerce-breadcrumb breadcrumbs uppercase']
Get locator for selector: //nav[@class='woocommerce-breadcrumb breadcrumbs uppercase']
Choose product from available items
Get locator for selector: //div[contains(@class, 'product-small col') and not(.//*[contains(text(), 'Nicht vorrätig')])] at index: 0
Get locator for selector: //div[contains(@class, 'product-small col') and not(.//*[contains(text(), 'Nicht vorrätig')])]
Wait for element to be visible: //input[@type='number']
Get locator for selector: //input[@type='number']
Wait for element to be visible: //button[@name='add-to-cart']
Get locator for selector: //button[@name='add-to-cart']
Add product to shopping bag
Get text from element: //h1[@class='product-title product_title entry-title']
Wait for element to be visible: //h1[@class='product-title product_title entry-title']
Get locator for selector: //h1[@class='product-title product_title entry-title']
Get locator for selector: //h1[@class='product-title product_title entry-title']
Click on element: //button[@name='add-to-cart']
Wait for element to be visible: //li[@class='cart-item has-icon has-dropdown current-dropdown cart-active']// ul[@class='nav-dropdown nav-dropdown-default']
Get locator for selector: //li[@class='cart-item has-icon has-dropdown current-dropdown cart-active']// ul[@class='nav-dropdown nav-dropdown-default']

parameters.name: selector
parameters.value: //li[@class='cart-item has-icon has-dropdown current-dropdown cart-active']// ul[@class='nav-dropdown nav-dropdown-default']

parameters.name: selector
parameters.value: //li[@class='cart-item has-icon has-dropdown current-dropdown cart-active']// ul[@class='nav-dropdown nav-dropdown-default']

steps.name: Wait for element to be visible: //div[@class='message-container container success-color medium-text-center']
Get locator for selector: //div[@class='message-container container success-color medium-text-center']
Go to shopping bag page
Click on element: //a[@title='Warenkorb']
Wait for element to be visible: //table[@class='shop_table shop_table_responsive cart woocommerce-cart-form__contents']
Get locator for selector: //table[@class='shop_table shop_table_responsive cart woocommerce-cart-form__contents']
Get items in shopping bag
Get locator for selector: //table[@class='shop_table shop_table_responsive cart woocommerce-cart-form__contents']/tbody/tr
Get text from element: //td[@class='product-name']//a at index 0
Get locator for selector: //td[@class='product-name']//a at index: 0
Get locator for selector: //td[@class='product-name']//a
Proceed to checkout from shopping bag page
Click on element: //div[@class='wc-proceed-to-checkout']
Wait for element to be visible: //a[@class='current']
Get locator for selector: //a[@class='current']
Fill all required fields on checkout page
Get locator for selector: //input[@name='billing_email']
Get locator for selector: //input[@name='billing_first_name']
Get locator for selector: //input[@name='billing_last_name']
Get locator for selector: //input[@name='billing_address_1']
Get locator for selector: //input[@name='billing_postcode']
Get locator for selector: //input[@name='billing_city']
Get locator for selector: //input[@name='billing_phone']
Choose Direct Bank Transfer method, check legal checkbox
Click on element: //input[@id='payment_method_bacs']
Get locator for selector: //input[@id='legal']
Get total amount from checkout page
Get text from element: //tr[@class='order-total']//span[@class='woocommerce-Price-amount amount'][1] at index 0
Get locator for selector: //tr[@class='order-total']//span[@class='woocommerce-Price-amount amount'][1] at index: 0
Get locator for selector: //tr[@class='order-total']//span[@class='woocommerce-Price-amount amount'][1]
Confirm order and go to Order Confirmation Page
Click on element: //button[@id='place_order']
Verify order received page is opened
Wait for element to be visible: //p[contains(., 'Vielen Dank. Deine Bestellung ist eingegangen.')]
Get locator for selector: //p[contains(., 'Vielen Dank. Deine Bestellung ist eingegangen.')]
Get locator for selector: //p[contains(., 'Vielen Dank. Deine Bestellung ist eingegangen.')]
Get locator for selector: //a[contains(., 'Bestellung abgeschlossen ')]
Verify order details are correct on Order Confirmation Page
